A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Wow\, did I see the same movie as all the 5 star reviews???  I cannot for the life of me find one redeeming thing to say about this movie.  Ok\, the music was great...there\, that's one.

SPOILERS
Seriously\, this movie was terrible.  Half the movie took a dump on old characters (Luke\, Leia and Ackbar) with irrational behavior\, corny scenes and questionable send-offs.  The other half followed around other new characters (Rose and Holdo)  that were one-dimensional and forgettable.  

And the main plot of the movie.. the resistance on a slow speed chase by the 1st order because they were running low on fuel???  With all the SJW in this movie I was waiting for them to start lecturing on alternative\, clean fuel sources.
